name: Dust 'em up
description:
Dust 'em up is a 2.5D Platformer. Complete all the levels to win!

You and your thrusty broom will have to clean up all the dust,
while jumping on books and dodging fearless enemies.

Dust 'em up was developed by Arthur, Patriek and Jari. With art from Jasmine, Linde and Jennifer.

How to play:

Press Run Game
You need to have a mouse and keyboard.
